Self.Wiki: Determines the handling for hand inverse kinematics.

inInterpolateTime.Wiki: The start interpolation time for hand IK. In seconds.

outInterpolateTime.Wiki: The end interpolation time for hand IK. In seconds.

normalPosOffset_offsetX.Wiki: The position offset to apply on the x-axis during hand IK.

normalPosOffset_offsetY.Wiki: The position offset to apply on the y-axis during hand IK.

normalPosOffset_offsetZ.Wiki: The position offset to apply on the z-axis during hand IK.

normalRotOffset_offsetX.Wiki: The rotation offset to apply on the x-axis during hand IK.

normalRotOffset_offsetY.Wiki: The rotation offset to apply on the y-axis during hand IK.

normalRotOffset_offsetZ.Wiki: The rotation offset to apply on the z-axis during hand IK.
